scenario.author: IanL
scenario.additional_info: This is the map used for the scenario that ships with CMFB “Action at Lanzerath Ridge”. I made the map using google earth (or the terrain) and the pictures and maps in the book The Longest Winter https://www.amazon.ca/The-Longest-Winter-Decorated-Platoon/dp/0306814404 (for period pictures). This map is much larger than what was used in the scenario. It includes the ridge where the fighting took place, the village and a fair amount of the area south of the village too.

scenario.author: nik mond
scenario.filename: Monschau and Rur River Master Map.btt

scenario.author: CMFDRJ
scenario.additional_info:
CMBS Training Maps Ported to WW2 (BN, FB, FI, RT)
The maps from Black Sea training campaign ported to Battle for Normandy, Final Blitzkrieg, Fortress Italy and Red Thunder.
Every elements but the terrain and buildings have been removed. The maps are ready for whatever your imagination is up to.

scenario.author: Bartimeus
scenario.additional_info: 1552×1504 maps. Doesn’t have setup zones or objectives. Simple Final Blitzkrieg map to add to your collection.
